name: Lysandra Shadowcloak
appearance: A tall, slender woman with long, raven-black hair and piercing icy blue eyes. She wears a dark cloak adorned with intricate silver runes that seem to shift and glow when she casts spells.

stunts.name: Rune Blast
stunts.description: You can focus your arcane energy into a single rune, causing it to crack and explode with devastating force. Inflicts additional damage equal to 3d6.

stunts.name: Shadow Step
stunts.description: When you move silently through shadows, you gain +2 to Dodge rolls as you become one with the darkness.

stunts.name: Runic Recall
stunts.description: You can recall ancient runes from your memory and inscribe them on a surface within 5 feet. This allows you to cast a powerful spell without any material components.

fears: Being betrayed by those he trusts
The return of a dark entity from his past
desires: Uncovering the truth behind his lineage
Protecting the innocent from malevolent forces
Mastering every aspect of his magical heritage

backstory.origin: Lysandra was born into an ancient line of mages, her parents whispering tales of a powerful being that must be sealed away. Raised in secrecy, she discovered her affinity for magic at a young age.
backstory.formativeEvent: One fateful night, the seal protecting their hidden enclave cracked open, unleashing a horde of malevolent spirits and exposing Lysandra to the wider world.
backstory.secret: She is the last surviving descendant of an ancient lineage of mages who can wield powerful dark magic. The secrets she holds are guarded by her inimitable set of runes and an unforgiving code of silence.
backstory.summary: Now a wandering mage, Lysandra seeks to unravel the mysteries of her past while navigating a world where shadows conceal far more than they reveal.

voice.speechPattern: Lays out information in carefully constructed sentences, often using paradoxes or metaphors that require careful consideration.
voice.quirks: Speaks in a soft, melodic voice but can become more forceful when discussing her craft or the dangers facing her world.
